```{r}
set.seed(128)
n <- 2000
u1 <-  runif(n)
u2 <- runif(n)
M <- exp(exp(1))
g <- exp(exp(u1))
na <- sum(u2 <= (g/M)) # scale by M for range of 0 to 1
I <- na* M / n # rescale later
I
```
